nodes.bodyText:
Tests should pass if you use a method reference here as follows 
  
    
      keycloak/testsuite/integration-arquillian/tests/base/src/test/java/org/keycloak/testsuite/admin/AuthzCleanupTest.java
    
    
         Line 102
      in
      419d9c6
    
    
    
    

        
          
           testingClient.server().run(AuthzCleanupTest::setup); 
        
    
  

.
I was stuck on how to pass the resource ID, since the reference has to be a static method. But finding the resource by name instead should work fine.
You should get the client from the realm. For instance, using org.keycloak.models.RealmModel#getClientById.
Do you really need to set this to null?
If clientOwner has to be final, yes. But since that should be unnecessary, I'll remove the keyword.
